Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: indicator_view
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Maria Egly
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Indicator viewer. Shows a tree of worldstates based on a user selected root worldstate, a timeline for all indicators of type "timeintervals" contained in the worldstates shown in the tree, and a bar chart for indicators of types "number" or "histogram"

Preference.name: showGroupBy
Preference.description: Check this item if the user shall be able to switch grouping of indicators
Preference.label: Switch Group

Preference.name: showTree
Preference.description: Check this item if the worldstate tree shall be displayed
Preference.label: Display Worldstate Tree

Preference.name: showTimeline
Preference.description: Check this item if the timeline indicators shall be displayed
Preference.label: Display Timeline

Preference.name: showChart
Preference.description: Check this item if the histogram indicators shall be displayed
Preference.label: Display Chart

InputEndpoint.name: basic_worldstate
InputEndpoint.label: Basic World State
InputEndpoint.description: The root world state for the tree

OutputEndpoint.name: selected_indicators
OutputEndpoint.label: Selected Indicators
OutputEndpoint.description: The indicators selected by the user

OutputEndpoint.name: selected_worldstates
OutputEndpoint.label: Selected World States
OutputEndpoint.description: The world states selected by the user
